title: Dummy
brief_description: Pregnant with absence, ‘Dummy’ depicts desolate urban and suburban environments. Filmed in and around Melbourne, these everyday, expectant spaces are captured with formal elegance and an accidental beauty that reveals a unique insight into the secret and forgotten life of Melbourne.
